an3.146:1.1: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an3.146:1.3: Akusalena kāyakammena, akusalena vacīkammena, akusalena manokammena—
an3.146:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an3.146:2.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge.
an3.146:2.3: Kusalena kāyakammena, kusalena vacīkammena, kusalena manokammena—
an3.146:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge”ti.
